name: Kimberly Marroquin
coverLetter:
Hello! My name is Kim Marroquin, and I am very interested in any position In trimming. If a position is still available I would absolutely love the opportunity to work for you. I do have a valid Medical Marijuana doctor's recommendation as well as a California Drivers License, my own vehicle, I am willing to drive as I currently reside in Anaheim, and I am 27 years of age. 

I am an experienced Budtender, and knowledgeable about cannabis, its effects, strains, ways of medicating, different products etc... as well as local, state and federal laws regarding medicinal and recreational marijuana. 

I would be PERFECT for this position because I am very passionate about marijuana as a medical aid. I find it to be an extremely effective alternative to alleviate discomfort from a patient's life. My passion for this as well as knowledge, understanding nature, customer service skills, and experience in the Medical Marijuana Industry makes me a great person for this job even if it is only trimming. The attention to detail and care about the plant is important when trimming. People put a lot of care into growing the medicine, so efficient care should be applied when trimming as well.

If I am given the position, I will be available 24/7. I can work any day at anytime and can start whenever you need me. I look very forward to hearing from you! 

Thank you!
